content:
Viator and GetYourGuide are both reputable companies that offer a wide range of tours and activities. As for discounts and promotions, I've got some good news for you!

**Viator:**

* Viator often offers a 10% discount for first-time customers. You can check their website for the latest promotions and discounts.
* They also have a "Price Match Guarantee," which means if you find a lower price for the same tour or activity, they'll match it.
* Viator sometimes offers package deals or bundles that can save you money when booking multiple tours or activities.

**GetYourGuide:**

* GetYourGuide occasionally offers a 10% discount for new customers. Keep an eye on their website or sign up for their newsletter to stay informed about promotions.
* They have a "Best Price Guarantee," which ensures you'll get the lowest price for your tour or activity.
* GetYourGuide often features special deals or discounts on specific tours or activities, so be sure to check their website regularly.

**Tips:**

* Always check the companies' websites for the latest promotions and discounts before booking.
* Sign up for their newsletters or follow them on social media to stay informed about special offers.
* Look for package deals or bundles that can save you money when booking multiple tours or activities.
* Be flexible with your travel dates, as some tours or activities might be cheaper on certain days of the week or during the off-season.

By comparing prices and services, you'll be able to find the best option for your needs and budget. Don't hesitate to reach out to their customer support teams if you have any questions or need help with booking.

Happy tour hunting!
